entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
